name: Sparc
description: Sparc is a professional networking platform for securing jobs, career mentorship, and making money (coaching and tutoring). College students and professionals leverage their "professional organization pages" on Sparc to connect directly with employers (via their company page) to form partnerships and arrange recruiting events.
one_liner: Sparc is a professional networking platform for securing jobs, career mentorship, and making money (coaching and tutoring). College students and professionals leverage their "professional organization pages" on Sparc to connect directly with employers (via their company page) to form partnerships and arrange recruiting events.
